ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Cap is a privacy-first, self-hosted CAPTCHA alternative that replaces traditional visual challenges with a lightweight, JavaScript-based proof-of-work system. It aims to be fast, dependency-free, and easily integrable into modern web applications, offering a more accessible and private user experience.

dtop is a terminal-based dashboard for real-time Docker container monitoring across multiple hosts. It provides instant visibility into container status, resource usage, and key metrics directly in the command line, with integration for viewing container logs via Dozzle.

YTConverter is a Python-based CLI tool for downloading and converting YouTube videos. It leverages yt-dlp and ffmpeg to offer features like format conversion, subtitle downloads, playlist support, and customizable download paths, all through an interactive terminal interface.

Dorion is a lightweight, alternative Discord client built with Rust and Tauri, designed for lower-spec or storage-constrained PCs. It offers a snappier experience and supports customization through themes and plugins.
